hasMenuItem.name: Kaju Katli
hasMenuItem.description: Kaju katli is a traditional Indian confection made with finely ground cashews and sugar, often enhanced with cardamom. It is typically garnished with edible silver leaf.

hasMenuItem.name: Rabdi
hasMenuItem.description: Rabri is a traditional Indian dessert made by reducing milk to a thick consistency, flavored with cardamom, and often garnished with nuts and saffron.

hasMenuItem.name: Burfi Khoya
hasMenuItem.description: Burfi khoya is a dense, milk-based sweet, traditionally made by simmering milk until it thickens, sweetened with sugar, and often flavored with cardamom, garnished with pistachios or almonds.

hasMenuItem.name: Burfi Besan
hasMenuItem.description: Burfi besan, a traditional Indian sweet, is made from roasted chickpea flour and ghee, typically flavored with cardamom and sometimes garnished with nuts.

hasMenuItem.name: Gulab Jamun
hasMenuItem.description: Dry milk cream, deep fried and served warm with sugar.

hasMenuItem.name: Matri
hasMenuItem.description: A savory snack made from white flour, typically deep-fried to achieve a crispy texture. Often includes spices for added flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Laddu Motichur
hasMenuItem.description: Laddu motichur consists of tiny, deep-fried gram flour balls, typically mixed with sugar syrup and lightly flavored with cardamom, often garnished with nuts.

hasMenuItem.name: Laddu Regular
hasMenuItem.description: Laddu regular is a classic Indian sweet, typically made from roasted gram flour, sweetened with sugar, and bound together with ghee.

hasMenuItem.name: Rasmalai (2 Piece)
hasMenuItem.description: Homemade cottage cheese and served chilled.

hasMenuItem.name: Badana
hasMenuItem.description: Boondi, a traditional Indian sweet, typically includes small, fried gram flour pearls soaked in sugar syrup, often flavored with cardamom or rose water.

hasMenuItem.name: Plain Burfi(1 lb)
hasMenuItem.description: Plain burfi is a traditional Indian sweet made from condensed milk, sugar, and typically flavored with cardamom. It has a dense, fudgy texture.

hasMenuItem.name: BHUJIA
hasMenuItem.description: Bhujia, a sugar confectionery, typically includes a sweet and savory blend of spices and ingredients, offering a crispy texture.

hasMenuItem.name: Burfi Bikaneri
hasMenuItem.description: Burfi Bikaneri is a traditional Indian confection made from condensed milk, sugar, and typically includes cardamom and dry fruits, offering a rich, milky taste.

hasMenuItem.name: Burfi Pista
hasMenuItem.description: Burfi pista is a dense, milk-based sweet, typically includes ground pistachios and is flavored with cardamom.

hasMenuItem.name: Dhoda
hasMenuItem.description: Dhoda is a milk-based confection, typically includes wheat solids and is known for its nutty flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Gajer Halwa
hasMenuItem.description: Grated carrots slow-cooked with milk and sugar, typically includes cardamom and garnished with assorted nuts and raisins.

hasMenuItem.name: Laddu Besan
hasMenuItem.description: Laddu besan is a traditional Indian sweet made from roasted gram flour, typically combined with ghee and sugar, and often flavored with cardamom.

hasMenuItem.name: Pedha
hasMenuItem.description: Pedha, a traditional Indian sweet, is made from condensed milk solids, sugar, and cardamom, typically shaped into small, thick discs.

hasMenuItem.name: Pini Alsi
hasMenuItem.description: Pini alsi, a traditional Indian sweet, typically includes flaxseeds, nuts, and seeds, combined to form rich, dense balls.

hasMenuItem.name: Rasgulla
hasMenuItem.description: Ball-shaped dumplings of Indian cottage cheese and semolina, soaked in a light sugar syrup.

hasMenuItem.name: Sirni
hasMenuItem.description: Sirni typically includes a blend of flour, sugar, and ghee, often enriched with cardamom and sometimes nuts, creating a sweet and dense treat.

hasMenuItem.name: Milk Cake
hasMenuItem.description: A traditional Indian sweet made by reducing milk with sugar and ghee, often flavored with cardamom and garnished with nuts.

hasMenuItem.name: Kalakand
hasMenuItem.description: Kalakand is a traditional Indian sweet made by condensing milk and sugar, typically garnished with pistachios and almonds to enhance its flavor and texture.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Tikka(FULL)
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken breast marinated with spices and cooked slowly in a tandoor.

hasMenuItem.name: Paneer Tikka
hasMenuItem.description: Paneer marinated with spices and cooked in a tandoor.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Tandoori(full)
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and mild spices, cooked in a clay oven.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Tandoori(Half)
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and mild spices, cooked in a clay oven.

hasMenuItem.name: Malai Chicken Tikka
hasMenuItem.description: Boneless chicken marinated with light spices and creamy base.

hasMenuItem.name: Tandoori Fish
hasMenuItem.description: Fish marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in a tandoor.

review.reviewBody: There wasn't enough naan compared with the amounts competitors give

the food is delicious and i would recommend people at this store.
the sizes are really good too.
Nice sweets and fresh. Hot jalebi(1 pound) was very fresh and crisp. Just wish the packaging was more secure and taped closed.
My absolutely favourite restaurant. They serve authentic Punjabi taste
Absolutely lovely! Would like to order more from this restaurant! Highly recommend
